EmailTemplate.name: PS GSL1 PRM-Request Reactivate Revoked Partner User in NAM
EmailTemplate.subject: PRM-Request Reactivate Revoked Partner User in NAM : {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.PS_Escalated_To_Name__c},
Please process the following Partner-related request based on the details below:
PRM-Request to Reactivate Partner User in NAM
Support Portal Partner Request to Reactivate a Partner User That Was Revoked in NAM
Organization Name
ALCR ID / 1*
SAP ID / 2*
Account ID / 3*
User Name
User Email
User Type
Federation ID
Additional Notes
Once completed, please revert with the confirmation.
If additional information is needed, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at partner.support@nokia.com.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Partner Support Desk Email: partner.support@nokia.com
Partner Portal
Copyright 2020 Nokia
Thread Id: {{!Case.Thread_Id}}
